ygData.subject: Song Analysis Statistics?
ygData.msgSnippet: Rokenn, very good job on the song analysis web site.  I must say I am pleased to finally see a great source of information about bard songs, especially one
ygData.messageBody:
Rokenn, very good job on the song analysis web site. I must say I am
pleased to finally see a great source of information about bard songs,
especially one that is continuously updated and revised.

One thing that I was REALLY hoping to find in the song analysis database
was more information about the actual damage statistics caused by DoT
songs such as CoD and DDD with instruments and without. Considering I
rarely use weapons any more except in certain circumstances, knowing the
damage that I am doing with these songs would help me better evaluate
which is better to use in a given situation.

I know that you can get a friend to duel you and do the tests on them but
it would help to know the damage formula, especially when the damage
increases with levels.

I am really surprised the damage statistics have been so hard to find
considering that when it comes to weapons and spells, the amount of damage
they each can do in a set time is how everyone compares them. (Throw in
mana used versus damage caused for spells of course)

If anyone has more information on this I would greatly appreciate it if
you could post it or point me to a URL containing it.

Gabryel
Bard, Level 27
Erollisi Marr
